content:
Announcing SUSHI 2.2.1 with the following bug fixes:

  • Fixes failing to find element slices when other elements have the same slice name
  • Always fallback to packages2.fhir.org when a package doesnâ€™t exist at packages.fhir.org
  • Fix assignment of value 0 on Quantities
    To install or update to this release, run the following command:
npm install -g fsh-sushi

For more information, see the SUSHI 2.2.1 release notes
